title: Define BCI Interface Specification
description: Create a detailed specification of how the Brain-Computer Interface (BCI) will interact with the gaming controller.

title: Design Controller Hardware
description: Create a design for the physical gaming controller that accommodates BCI technology.

title: Develop BCI Firmware
description: Create firmware that interprets brain signals and sends appropriate game commands.

title: Develop Gaming Application Backend
description: Create the server-side application to manage game states and interactions.

title: Develop Gaming Application Frontend
description: Create the user interface for the gaming application.

title: Integrate BCI with Gaming Application
description: Connect the developed BCI firmware to the gaming application.

title: Test BCI Integration
description: Conduct functional tests to ensure the BCI integration works as intended.

title: Document Controller Assembly Process
description: Create assembly instructions for the gaming controller.
